sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.title: First Come First Served below market rate sales listings
sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.agency: Mayor’s Office of Housing and Community Development
sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.description: These listings are for units that need more applicants. We review applications in the order they come in.

sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.title: Get help with your downpayment
sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.agency: Mayor’s Office of Housing and Community Development
sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.description: The City Second Loan Program is a loan for a downpayment on a home. This program is for first-time homebuyers to use for select units.

sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.title: Other San Francisco rental programs
sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.agency: Mayor’s Office of Housing and Community Development
sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.description: Find out about other rental help in San Francisco. You can also get information on Section 8 vouchers and rent subsidies.

sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.title: Support for homelessness
sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.agency: Department of Homelessness and Supportive Housing
sanFranciscoHousingPrograms.description: If you need a place to stay, contact an Access Point to get help. Access Points are local nonprofits that can match you with housing and services.

nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.title: Housing for seniors and people with disabilities in the SF Bay Area
nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.description: Affordable and low income opportunities in the SF Bay Area. Created by Openhouse and updated monthly.

nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.title: Home Match
nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.description: A service that pairs people who are sharing a home with people who are looking for a home.

nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.title: Alameda County Housing Portal
nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.agency: Alameda County - Housing and Community Development (HCD) Department

nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.title: San Mateo County Housing Portal
nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.agency: San Mateo County - Department of Housing (DOH)
nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.description: Affordable housing in San Mateo County.

nonMOHCDHousingPrograms.title: City of San José Housing Portal
